document_data.caption: A map of the River Thent and the surrounding area circa [[1480 DR]]
document_data.name: River Thent
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Thent''' was a river located in the [[Moonsea North]] region of [[north Faerûn]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}}
document_data.Geography:
The river originated from [[Lake Thentar]] in the Great Grey Land of [[Thar]], and flowed southward into the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] lake.

The [[Sword Trail]] crossed the river at a point just west of the independent city of [[Thentia]].
